title: 15h02 - Food services.
text:
Contracts to provide food
services to employees in Federal Government buildings and installations, or the
employees of firms which are managing Government facilities, are subject to
CWHSSA. Cooks, waitresses, buspersons, and related jobs are considered laborers
or mechanics covered by the CWHSSA.
html: Contracts to provide food services to employees in Federal Government buildings and installations, or the employees of firms which are managing Government facilities, are subject to CWHSSA. Cooks, waitresses, buspersons, and related jobs are considered laborers or mechanics covered by the CWHSSA.
